question: When did Limoges receive the label "City of Art and History"?
asked_question_translated: Milloin Limoges sai nimityksen "Taiteen ja historian kaupunki"?
answer: Limoges sai nimityksen "Taiteen ja historian kaupunki" vuonna 2008.
answer_translated_eng: Limoges was named "City of Art and History" in 2008.
